modName: Mihail's House Cats - Colors and Sound Patch
summary:
Mihail did a great and a cute job with his House Cats mod.
I added, for my game, some extra colors and a different "meow" sound to the cats.
And now I'm sharing it. Hope you like it.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
House Cats- Mihail Monsters and Animals
Colors and Sound patch by Xtudo - v0.2
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Description
===========
Mihail did a great and cute job with his House Cats mod.
I added, for my game, some extra colors and a different "meow" sound to the cats.
And now I'm sharing it. Hope you like it.

The extra colors are: White, grey, black, brown and spotted. For example, there are 7 cats in 
Riften, now they are one of each color, including the original color.

Sound: There are two files now, with 6 different "meow" now, so there is more variety. And 
removed the "purr".

I also removed some little dirty edits.


ChangeLog
===========
Ver 0.1 - Release
Ver 0.2 - Tweaked/fixed textures. New colors added.


Installation
=============
1. There are 3 installation options:

00 Colors and Sound: It is the full installation, new colors and sounds.

01 Color: New colors and the original sound.

02 Sound: Original mod, it only changes the sound.

Extract the downloaded RAR file, enter the selected folder version, and copy the DATA folder to 
your Skyrim installation folder, overwrite.


Requeriments
=============
- None.


Licensing/Legal
===============
- Thanks to Mihail for his awesome work.
- Thanks to PanPi for the new textures.
- Many thanks to Bethesda for making such a piece of art! I love you guys/gals! :D
author: Xtudo
